visit_add_database_plugin(
    NAME        ADIOS2
    SRC         avtMEUMMAPSFileFormat.C
                avtGTCFileFormat.C
                avtPixie3DFileFormat.C
                avtADIOS2BaseFileFormat.C
                avtADIOS2SSTFileFormat.C
                avtLAMMPSFileFormat.C
                avtSpecFEMFileFormat.C
                ADIOS2HelperFuncs.C
    TPINC       ${ADIOS2_INCLUDE_DIR}
    TPLIBDIR    ${ADIOS2_LIBRARY_DIR}
    TPLIBS      ${ADIOS2_LIB} VTK::FiltersHybrid VTK::vtksys
    TPINCPAR    ${ADIOS2_PAR_INCLUDE_DIR}
    TPLIBDIRPAR ${ADIOS2_PAR_LIBRARY_DIR}
    TPLIBSPAR   ${ADIOS2_PAR_LIB} VTK::FiltersHybrid VTK::vtksys)

if(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    target_compile_definitions(EADIOS2Database_par PRIVATE ADIOS2_USE_MPI)
endif()
